contentrichtext.text: There are several hospitals named '''Queen Mary Hospital''' : *[[Queen Mary Hospital, Hong Kong|Queen Mary Hospital]] in [[Hong Kong]] *[[Queen Mary Hospital, England|Queen Mary Hospital]] in [[England]] *[[Queen Mary Hospital, New Zealand|Queen Mary Hospital]] in [[New Zealand]] *Queen Mary Hospital in [[Toronto]], [[Canada]] (1913-1970): a [[sanatorium]] for children with [[tuberculosis]]<ref>http://www.torontoplaques.com/Pages_PQR/Queen_Mary_Hospital.html</ref> {{Hospital disambiguation}} ==References== {{reflist}} [[zh:瑪莉醫院]]
